languages.text: Лишь одна плата интересует друкари — живые люди. Набив трюмы жертвами, ксеносы убираются из системы.
The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.
languages.original_text: Лишь одна плата интересует друкари — живые люди. Набив трюмы жертвами, ксеносы убираются из системы.

traits.locale_text: The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.
The temporary measure preserves the voidships bound for neighbouring systems.
The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.

The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.

languages.text: Les Drukharis n'acceptent qu'une seule forme de paiement : la traite des êtres vivants. Leurs cales remplies de victimes, les xénos disparaissent du système.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.

traits.locale_text: Les Drukharis n'acceptent qu'une seule forme de paiement : la traite des êtres vivants. Leurs cales remplies de victimes, les xénos disparaissent du système.

languages.text: デュカーリが関心を持つのは生きている人間だけである。犠牲者で手荷物をいっぱいにすると、異種族は星系から姿を消した。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリが関心を持つのは生きている人間だけである。犠牲者で手荷物をいっぱいにすると、異種族は星系から姿を消した。

languages.text: 黑暗灵族唯一感兴趣的东西就是活人。这些异形把船舱里塞满了受害者之后，就从这个星系中消失了。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗灵族唯一感兴趣的东西就是活人。这些异形把船舱里塞满了受害者之后，就从这个星系中消失了。

languages.text: A los Drukhari solo les interesa una forma de pago: gente viva. Tras llenar sus bodegas de víctimas, los xenos desaparecen del sistema.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.

traits.locale_text: A los Drukhari solo les interesa una forma de pago: gente viva. Tras llenar sus bodegas de víctimas, los xenos desaparecen del sistema.

languages.text: Die Drukhari interessieren sich nur für eine Form der Bezahlung: lebende Menschen. Nachdem sie ihre Frachträume mit Opfern vollgestopft haben, verschwinden die Xenos aus dem System.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.

traits.locale_text: Die Drukhari interessieren sich nur für eine Form der Bezahlung: lebende Menschen. Nachdem sie ihre Frachträume mit Opfern vollgestopft haben, verschwinden die Xenos aus dem System.

languages.text: Drukhariler sadece tek bir ödeme şekliyle ilgileniyor: Kanlı canlı insanlar. Ambarlarını kurbanlarla dolduran zenolar, sistemden kayboluyor.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari are only interested in one form of payment: living people. Having filled their holds with victims, the xenos disappear from the system.
